pages.text: $(l)(Active-Defensive)/$$(br)Deployable AA is deployed on your own board $(l)on unknown tiles/$. As long as they are not destroyed, they will act just like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/anti_air)Anti-Air/$.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Try to place deployable AA where you think the opponent will use their bombers, like inside of large unknown areas.$(li)Don't use these if the opponent doesn't have any bombers, as they'll be useless and are just a waste of energy.

$(li)Deployable AA must be placed on unknown tiles, meaning that any tile that has already been damaged is not valid. $(l)If you ignore this and still try to place these on a known tile, then nothing happens and the ability is wasted./$$(li)Don't place this on occupied tiles, as the ability will be wasted.
